Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Class ContextualChannel<C,P>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.ContextualChannel<C,P>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of context this channel has.
P - the type of payload this channel sends and receives.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel
public class ContextualChannel<C,P> extends Object implements Channel
Describes a channel that sends and receives contextual payloads.

Note: Payloads to not have to extend ContextualChannel<C,P>.com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.ContextualChannel.Payload.

      context - the context to send.

    • isToServer

      public boolean isToServer()
      Description copied from interface: Channel
      Gets whether this channel receives payloads on the server.

      Note: channels can receive on both server and client.

      Specified by:
      isToServer in interface Channel
      Returns:
      true if this channel receives on the server.
